title: Get TTO video linking requests as a brand

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns to filter the results by. To obtain a list of TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ . Max size: 50.

parameters.name: handle_names
parameters.description: The creator handle names to filter the results by. Max size: 50.

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link . If this field is not specified, all campaigns will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.
